name: Disneyâ€¢Pixar Toy Story Mania!
description: Inspired by the Disney/Pixar feature film, Toy Story and the 4D Toy Story Mania attraction at Disneyland Resort and Walt Disney World Resort, Toy Story Mania! is now available for PC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP (with Service Pack 3), Windows Vista Processor: Intel Pentium IV at 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM NVIDIA FX 5200, ATI Radeon 9200 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Input Devices: Windows Compatible Keyboard & Mouse

reviews.review_text: This would be a decent game if the graphics wouldn't fail (really bugged, titles overlaying, missing characters) but even then, I'm glad I got this 50% off. Still expensive for what it has to offer. Very little, that is. Dissapointing!
